body:
Hey everyone, OPTOBAT here, and just to lighten the mood of the server at the moment, i wanted to show you a comment i made on YouTube.

I was really bored last night and was mucking around, so i typed in a basic comment, that turned into a semi-"viral" thread.


http://imgur.com/9Uvt0J1

Sorry, you will have to go by the link, as i don't know/couldn't get the actual screenshot in here...
body_tagged:

title: Lol, YouTube Commenting ;)

replies.body: (By the time some people got annoyed, i replied basic comments like this one to them, and liked my own comment, just to add a little boisterousness to it :D)
